item.description:
"Peace" is a world that we are all looking for!
Everyone may have different idea about it. Let's share and discuss it!

This month, we are going to host the meetup at Peace Abbey.
(Location: Peace Abbey
Two North Main Street
Sherborn, MA 01770)

Here is a schedule that you can join us anytime. please RSVP, if you are coming. Thank you very much

10-11am: time for pray
(optional)

11-1pm: lunch time
(optional)

1-3pm: book discussion
( We are going to discuss a chapter from Tao-Te Ching Ch42)
http://academic.brook...

3-5pm: apple picking
(optional)



Direction:
From Boston
Mass Turnpike 90 West to Route 95 South. Exit on Route 16 West. Follow 16 to Sherborn. At T intersection, turn left onto Route 27 South (still 16 West). The Peace Abbey is 1/4 mile down on 27 on the left before fork in road.

From New York
Interstate 95 North to 495 North. Exit at 109 East. Take 109 to 27 North in Medfield, MA. Take left on 27 and continue over Charles River into Sherborn. Take right into driveway just beyond first stop sign. Pacifist Memorial and Gandhi statue are visible at stop sign.

Parking:
street parking is available, if inside is too crowded.
Car-pool is also available. Please let me know! Thank you very much

About this Meetup Group
item.name: Westborough Spirituality September Meetup: topic PEACE
